message: I understand you value a larger share, but this split accounts for the inflation affecting us both. It ensures a good deal for us both in the long run.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bigger share.
Alice, let's be realistic. The value is diminishing rapidly. This offer gives you a larger share than the previous one, recognizing the time pressure we are both under.
Time is running out, but I still believe I can get a better deal. This is my most generous offer yet.
Alice, this is it.  We're running out of time and the money is losing value fast.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical option at this point. Let's take it before we both lose out.
